sentences.en: C - Problematic system: takes too long to do, costs too much, needs improvement.
sentences.cn: 有问题的系统:时 间过长, 成本太高, 需要改进.

sentences.en: Cavitating torpedoes remain rare, not least because they are problematic.
sentences.cn: 超空泡鱼雷仍然十分罕见, 尤其是因为这类鱼类自身还存在问题.

sentences.en: In the case of uncertainty, the definition of rationality becomes problematic.
sentences.cn: 在非确定型的情况, 合理性的概念却难以确定.

sentences.en: It could be a bit problematic, legally speaking.
sentences.cn: 从法律上讲，会有点问题。
在这个领域内有文章可做.

sentences.en: It is apparent that obtaining enough water is problematic.
sentences.cn: 很显然,要获得充足的水还存在问题.

sentences.en: Poor communication exacerbated an already problematic arrangement with the between office cultures.
sentences.cn: 贫乏的合作造成的办公差异使本来就成问题的安排变得更加的不合理.

sentences.en: Some places are more problematic than others for women traveling alone.
sentences.cn: 对那些独自旅行的女性来说，在有些地方遇到的问题会比其他地方更多。

sentences.en: Such an operation is problematic to implement and explain.
sentences.cn: 这样的操作实现和解释起来都有问题.

sentences.en: The actual control condition at the root of the notch is more problematic.
sentences.cn: 在缺口根部的实际控制条件是更难捉摸的.

sentences.en: The future of our business is problematic.
sentences.cn: 我们的生意前景尚成疑问.

sentences.en: The future of the talks on the technical cooperation between the two companies is problematic.
sentences.cn: 两家公司间有关技术合作谈判的前景尚有疑问.

sentences.en: The reforms could turn out to be highly problematic .
sentences.cn: 改革最终可能会困难重重。

sentences.en: Then we speak of a test of the problematic premise.
sentences.cn: 那么我们就涉及对有问题的前提的检验.

sentences.en: We find this very literal approach to be limiting and potentially problematic.
sentences.cn: 然而,我们发现这种文学方法的作用有限,而且可能有潜在的问题.
我们都能感到问题没解决的那种刺激性.

words.tran_cn: 问题的；有疑问的；不确定的

trans.tran_cn: 成问题的，有疑问的，不确定的
trans.tran_en: involving problems and difficult to deal with
